proj.title: Onyx
proj.description: Onyx is our attempt at bringing simple and intuitive navigation to the smartwatch market. Instead of displaying complex text directions, our app displays a single arrow that points in the direction of your target. With its companion app for the iPhone, you can tap a point nearby you to start navigating!

proj.title: EagleEye
proj.description: EagleEye links into already existing CCTV feeds + webcam streams but provides a new wealth of data, simply by pairing the power of machine learning algorithms with the data already being captured. All of this is then output to a simple-to-use front-end website, where you can not only view updates in real-time but also filter your existing data to derive actionable insights about your customer base.
